text: chartered public schools admission amend rsa iii to read as follows there shall be no application fee for pupil admission to any chartered public school and any fees to be charged to students shall not be assessed as a condition for enrollment new subparagraph charted public schools enrollment amend rsa i c by inserting after subparagraph the following new subparagraph if a chartered public school accepts students preference shall be given to students in determination of the chartered public school s maximum published enrollment prior to any lottery selection pursuant to this subparagraph
